channel.title: Clan Citadel Team
channel.description:
If you are reading this, [u]PLEASE POST[/u] I would like to keep this topic alive until atleast afew days after the update, so people can make up there mind after they see it first-hand.
Well, runescape just released the official date release of the Clan Citadel.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rUI_uzIzoEQ&feature=channel_video_title]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rUI_uzIzoEQ&feature=channel_video_title[/url]
I think that whatever official MSCP clan should make a Clan Citadel Team, who are incharge of building the city.
Im not sure what its gonna be like, but since ive played roblox before i think it might be something like that, i would consider myself on the team, and im offering to take charge of the team.
I will be choosing 2 others to lead the team with me, and the rest will just be other developers.
Just post if you would like to be part of the team, and if you would like to be a leader, please post why you think you deserve it, and what you can do to contribute enough to call yourself a leader.
Please note you MUST be a part of the official MSCP Clan, aka, Equinox Empire [center][b][u]Citadel Team[/u][/b] [b]Team Leaders[/b] Orcashark Krackkid - [b]Other Developers[/b] Rash Acrodox LilXCj - - - - - - - - - -[/center][size=18pt][/size]

@DevilsCape wrote:

Knowing this community, people would vote for there friends in order for a "Rep++", or some Rsgp, or something.

I agree with that :o

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

DevilsCape:

I dont understand why everyone wants to be leader or have higher rank in the clan , it makes me feel sick to think about it , there should be voting about this i guess

Knowing this community, people would vote for there friends in order for a “Rep++”, or some Rsgp, or something.

Im not doing this because I want a leadership role, but because I believe I have the proper skills to benefit this community most in this subject.

Read full topic

I dont understand why everyone wants to be leader or have higher rank in the clan , it makes me feel sick to think about it , there should be voting about this i guess

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Well either way, I dont care what clan is MSCP Official, all I want is a Leadership rank in the Clan Citadel Team, if that is okay with everyone, I believe I have the proper leadership skills, although most of you may not have seen them.

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:41, topic:402914”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=499976.msg3658551#msg3658551 date=1310189362]
I never said I was to be in control. I, quite frankly, do not wish to lead a clan, nor any clan events. Though, I would like to be a part of one. As there was a topic with 30+ members wanting to join, to which I was the only one to invite, and nobody could change that, was ridiculous. I only wanted to get the clan back up, and started.

I will gladly promote someone of great standards, like yourself, to be the clan owner, and demote myself. By doing this, it saves all the clan members the hassle of having to be invited again, and only takes a mere two seconds of mine and your time.
[/quote]
Then in that case, I claim myself as the new leader.[/quote]

Lead us into the abyss!

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]I never said I was to be in control. I, quite frankly, do not wish to lead a clan, nor any clan events. Though, I would like to be a part of one. As there was a topic with 30+ members wanting to join, to which I was the only one to invite, and nobody could change that, was ridiculous. I only wanted to get the clan back up, and started.

I will gladly promote someone of great standards, like yourself, to be the clan owner, and demote myself. By doing this, it saves all the clan members the hassle of having to be invited again, and only takes a mere two seconds of mine and your time.[/quote]
Then in that case, I claim myself as the new leader.

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If you are targeting one clan, you really should just be PMing the members… to stop all this confusion

It’s completely irrelevant, he has no right at all to ownership until the old owner gives it to him, or leaves for good.

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Davidi2:

First we’d need to even come to a consensus about having one, get higher staff approval (and they may say no based on the TOS) and then worry about the details

Well, I was directing it to the people in the MSCP Clan im in… I dont know what clan is official, but whatever one is then I believe we should stick to that to obviously be the moparscape official City, but right now, I see no moderators approving clans to be official, so how could I target a specific one?

Davidi2:

I’m not arguing that he wasn’t inactive, I’m saying it still doesn’t mean you get control of the topic

Also regarding this, he seems to be the only one who is doing anything about the original owner being inacitve, I do believe he deserves the role to take control.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I dont see an inactive clause anywhere, you had no right to take it over, and I’m not going to be responsible for it. You can go ahead and make your own, and whoever wishes to can leave that one to join yours.

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No, you wanted me to lock a topic some one else had made for no real reason, and I said no because there was no reason I should hand ownership over to someone else unless the original person requested it. Stop twisting the topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

But the aforementioned topics were creating or advertising clans, not sending a ‘clan newsletter’ if you so will.

I just don’t see the point of the thread to be honest, if he’s aiming it at the clan.

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Wait what? No where did I say you can’t make clans, I said this guy can’t be saying that Moparscape is ‘his clan’, or his clan is ‘our clan’

Note those were also before the clan update (ie clans were not inclusive and didn’t required invites, it was just come and leave as you please)

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Citadel Team
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Actually, he said ‘our clan’, so unless he was directing this at only a specific group of people (in which case he should have used PM…) he was directing at the site. Which is why I brought up a ‘moparscape clan’ topic.

So if he is directing this at the clan members, I’ll just delete this for you guys and he can send out a PM.

Read full topic
